recommendations: Product Manager and Developer for KineMaster at NexStreaming

I had the opportunity to work closely with Xiangmiao as her supervisor for the better part of a year during her internship.  During that time she demonstrated a solid knowledge of not only the C programming language, but also programming and software engineering concepts in general.  I canhappily say that her experience was a valuable addition to the programming team.  Perhaps even more importantly, she has repeatedly shown the ability to rapidly grasp new concepts and learn new skills, a valuable trait in today's competitive and dynamic industry.Furthermore, for the entire time I worked with Xiangmiao, I was impressed by the enthusiasm with which she tackled new and challenging problems.  Xiangmiao seems to have a genuine interest and excitement about her field of study, which I believe is something that cannot be underestimated in its value in the workplace, especially in such a technical field.  I think her enthusiasm is contagious, and as such, a valuable asset to any team.

July 14, 2011, Xiangmiao and Teresa were students together

Teresa is a passionate person, both in work and in life. She is one of the most inspiring people I have ever met. Her natural integrity and responsibility make her a person I can always rely on. She is knowledgeable technically and also socially. Teresa is precise and serious when it comes to business, but at the same time she is easy and enjoyable to work with. She was always able to thoroughly answer my questions and easily resolve problems or concerns I had. I wholeheartedly recommend Teresa Cvach
